## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (`just fmt`)
- [ ] I have run lints (`just lint`) with no warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All tests pass (`just test`)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added an entry to CHANGELOG.md

## AAS Compliance

- [ ] Changes maintain AAS Part 2 encoding compliance
- [ ] CRDT semantics remain sound
- [ ] No breaking changes to wire protocol (or version bumped if so)
